page.title: 16The Church of Harberton
page.content: The Church is a large building considering the size of the village. The interior has been well maintained with a very ornate rood screen and pulpit. The Parish has recently celebrated its 750th. anniversary. In the near future the parish will be amalgamated with several adjacent churches. There is a regular attendance of about 40 people but more general support for church organised events. The annual Harvest Festival is an important village event much more widely supported. A regular Sunday school is attended by some 16 children. The church is the last remaining focal point in the village.
